name: SanXing Journey
description:
One of the most popular myths in China is HouYi shooting the Suns.

However, in our game, players will not play as the hero but as a mysterious wizard who has the power to connect heaven and men's world through the magic tree. The goal of the game is to pass the magic bow to HouYi after solving different puzzles.

A,D control movement, space for jump, mouse for UI interact.
